--------------------
Text: The Rose was an Elizabethan theatre.
Triplets:<The Rose
1:
--------------------
Text: The Rose (theatre):  It was the fourth of the public theatres to be built, after The Theatre (1576), the Curtain (1577), and the theatre at Newington Butts (c. 1580?)
Triplets:<The Rose
2:
--------------------
Text: The Rose (theatre):  – and the first of several playhouses to be situated in Bankside, Southwark, in a liberty outside the jurisdiction of the City of London's civic authorities.
Triplets:<The Rose
